summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prezzi page - all features working perfectly. Tested hero section, pricing tables, interactive elements, navigation, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: On mobile viewport, hero buttons may not stack perfectly vertically but remain functional

passed_tests: Prezzi page loads with hero section containing 'Prezzi 2026'
How pricing works section displays 3 info cards correctly
Two price tables (5.50m and 6m boats) render with 12 seasonal periods each
August 8-19 periods highlighted with fire icons in both tables
All Prenota buttons link correctly to FareHarbor booking system
What's included section shows all 6 items with proper icons
Fuel costs section displays 3 pricing tiers (€20, €50-60, €80)
Insurance section shows recommended (€30+€50) and alternative (€250) options
Joker Boat section displays 'coming soon' notice with WhatsApp/call CTAs
Season comparison cards show 3 seasonal options
Help choosing section has 3 criteria cards with functional CTAs
Final CTA section with booking and WhatsApp buttons works correctly
Navigation between home, itinerari, and prezzi pages functions properly
Mobile responsive design works on 390x844 viewport
All external links (FareHarbor, WhatsApp, phone) function correctly
Floating WhatsApp button is visible and functional
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
